entry.title: $2250 // No broker fee - Beautiful 2 bed in prime PLG - Elevator, Laundry
entry.content:
2 Bed / 1 Bath in PLG: Prospect Lefferts Gardens, Brooklyn. Pets Upon Approval. Beautiful 2 bedroom apartment in PLG. Newly upgraded kitchen, hardwood flooring, high ceilings spacious closets and generous windows with lots of light. It is located in a clean quiet building with a lovely lobby, attentive management, brand new laundry room and an elevator. It is a few blocks from Kings County and Downstate Hospitals. You can walk or bike to Prospect Park, Close by to the Prospect park (B,Q,S) Winthrop (2,5) and Church Ave (2,5) trains. **24 mo lease

Email for quick reply
